column5: a raid for illegal use of narcotics was carried out on the Lazy Fish Guesthouse

column11: do not know the brand------Sword and farm blades------Drug bags for packaging------Drug smoking paraphernalia------The suspects will be sent to the Phnom Penh Municipal Court following the procedure. ------POST NEWS
